column1: #Text=We just have to find out a way to control you when you 're like that .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're out of your mind .
#Text=" Fong says : " I guess we 'll figure it out on the way to the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Anybody got a problem with that ?
#Text=" Soldier says : " Do you still want an escort to Omashu ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I think we 're all set .
